Company Information

Dann Ruang Kreasi (DKR) is engaged in the interior decoration industry and the manufacture of furniture for household and office needs. Our scope of work includes interior design consulting and the manufacture of furniture such as tables, chairs, beds, cabinets, shelves, cabinets, room dividers, and the like.

Our strength lies in guaranteed quality due to the use of a working system and Standard Operating Procedures that are professional and supported by partners and extensive corporate relations from various business fields by the company founders and employees who have been tested for placement through a rigorous and measurable selection following his expertise.

Vision

Our strength lies in guaranteed quality due to the use of a working system and Standard Operating Procedures that are professional and supported by partners and extensive corporate relations from various business fields by the company founders and employees who have been tested for placement through a rigorous and measurable selection following his expertise.

Mision

  • Menghasilkan produk furniture berkualitas dengan mengedepankan green sustainability
  • Mengelola dan mengembangkan Sumber Daya Manusia yang professional
  • Meningkatkan kerjasama mitra bisnis dengan business partner untuk menghasilkan profit perusahaan.
